title: Debugged & Deconstructed
description: RESTful API that allows logged in users to write and edit blog posts about web development.

title: Space-E
description: RESTful API that fetches space-related data from several public third-party APIs to help users learn about space-related topics and upcoming events.

title: DinGen
description: JavaScript-based dinner generator that leverages data from two public third-party APIs to help users plan meals and find new recipes.

title: Coding Quiz
description: Tests junior developers on their front-end web development knowledge, and stores high scores locally.

title: E-Commerce Site
description: A functional back-end for an e-commerce site. Users can create, read, update, and delete product information as needed.

title: Employee Tracker
description: Simple CMS solution to view and modify basic employee data for an organization via the command line.
